name: Photographic Memory
description:
The stories of our lives keep diving into one another like pictures of pictures. As we dive into the memories, new stories arise and all is not always as it seems.

Unlock these moments as they were captured by the cameras of Louise, Berthe, and Georges over the last 50 years in the south of France.

Drag the right mouse button to orbit around the camera and left click to interact.

Finding the right settings allows you to snap the picture.

Each picture tells a story. Find the clue and you will unlock the next memory.

Team
  • François Mauge
  • Vincent Schneider
  • Antoine Smolders
  • Quentin Chevalier
  • Enrico Cerica
  • Anais Lacoste
